TopicTitle: Looking for a specific landing leg

Articles.Content:
So, I'm on a new sesion on 1.2.2  and I'm looking for a specific part from god-knows-where. All I can describe is it was a vertical leg that extended straight down. You had to attach it to the bottom of your vessel, since it had no lateral clearance. It also had an attachment node on the top (if I recall correctly). A rough drawing follows:

The landing toes were a little smaller. I am at a loss from where this part was. 

 

EDIT: Nevermind. Reddit helped me find it. Disregard and delete.

Edited February 26, 2017 by Djohaal
Reddit helped me find it. Disregard and delete.
